In honor of #HispanicHeritageMonth; I want to recognize LTC Marisol Chalas as the first Latina @NationalGuard  Black Hawk pilot. Born in the Dominican Republic, Chalas moved to Massachusetts in 1982, enlisted during high school and commissioned as an aviation officer in 2001.  https://t.co/PLtKYOB6bG
